indicator_name: Mortality rate attributed to household and ambient air pollution
target_name: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination
un_designated_tier: Tier I

footer_fields.label: Note
footer_fields.value: Number of premature deaths (attributable deaths): Number of deaths due to a disease insofar as it is attributable to particulate matter.

footer_fields.label: Note
footer_fields.value: Disability-Adjusted Life Years (DALY): Total sum of healthy life years lost due to death and morbidity as a result of a disease, insofar as it is attributable to particulate matter (mortality + morbidity).
